headline: President, in Davos, Invokes Boeing, Again and Again and Again
abstract: The day after Boeing said it did not expect regulators to approve the 737 Max to fly until the summer, Mr. Trump brought up the company on at least three separate occasions.
lead_paragraph: DAVOS, Switzerland — Boeing is back on President Trump’s mind.
keywords: Boeing 737 Max Groundings and Safety Concerns (2019)
